name: WildDice
description:
Implements the [Wild Dice](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D6_System#The_Wild_Die) rolling mechanic used in D6 System/OpenD6-games, and in [Star Wars D6](https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_D6).
* **!wd --help** Shows the Help screen
* **!wd [[dice expression]]** Ex. `!wd [[4d6+2]]` rolls 3 normal dice and one Wild dice
* **!wwd** for rolls whipsered to GM.
